Space._comment: For now contains all the Main locations

Dark Bramble._comment: Contains every location in the Dark Bramble planet

The Stranger.requires: |Signaloscope| and |Signal > DeepSpace| and |Stranger Presence Knowledge| and |@3b DLC entrance:1|

DreamWorld General._comment: Contains locations that doesnt belong to any specific Dreamworld (like the river or just entering the dreamworld in general)

Shrouded Woodlands.requires: |EYE > River Lowlands flame access| and |DreamWorld Knowledge|

Starlit Cove.requires: |EYE > Cinder Isles flame access| and |DreamWorld Knowledge|

Endless Canyon.requires: |EYE > Hidden Gorge flame access| and |DreamWorld Knowledge|

Subterranean Lake.requires: |DreamWorld Knowledge| and (|EYE > Submerge Structure flame access| or ((|DreamWorld Loading Glitch Knowledge| and (|EYE > River Lowlands flame access| or (|EYE > Cinder Isles flame access| and |DreamWorld Door Candle Knowledge|) or (|EYE > Hidden Gorge flame access| and (|DreamWorld Render Glitch Knowledge| or |DreamWorld Grabbing Hand Knowledge|)) ))) )
